name: Room King
description:
Room King

Two pieces of furniture fight for the best place in the room: the crown carpet.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:

A friend. This is a local multiplayer game.

CONTROLS:

Player 1 - WASD;
Player 2 - Arrow keys.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Find the crown carpet before your friend does! Pick up power-ups to gain advantages. These are:FAST: Increases your speed.
SLOWED: Reduces friend's speed.
CONFUSED: Reverses friend's controls.
SWAP: Swaps both players.CREDITS:
By @AD1337 and @cmlperes
For Ludum Dare 37: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=18059

Thanks for playing!
